org.ejml.alg.dense.decomposition
Interface QRDecomposition

All Superinterfaces:
DecompositionInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
QRDecompositionHouseholder, QRDecompositionHouseholderColumn
public interface QRDecomposition
extends DecompositionInterface

QR decompositions decompose a rectangular matrix 'A' such that 'A=QR'. Where A ∈ ℜ n × m , n ≥ m, Q ∈ ℜ n × n is an orthogonal matrix, and R ∈ ℜ n × m is an upper triangular matrix. Some implementations of QR decomposition require that A has full rank.

Some features of QR decompositions:

  • Can decompose rectangular matrices.
  • Numerically stable solutions to least-squares problem, but not as stable as SVD
  • Can incrementially add and remove columns from the decomposed matrix. See AdjLinearSolverQr

Orthogonal matrices have the following properties:

  • QQT=I
  • QT=Q-1

Author:
Peter Abeles
See Also:
QRDecompositionHouseholder, QRDecompositionHouseholderColumn

Method Detail

getQ

DenseMatrix64F getQ(DenseMatrix64F Q,
                    boolean compact)

Returns the Q matrix from the decomposition. Should only be called after decompose(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F) has been called.

If parameter Q is not null, then that matrix is used to store the Q matrix. Otherwise a new matrix is created.

Parameters:
Q - If not null then the Q matrix is written to it. Modified.
compact - If true an m by n matrix is created, otherwise n by n.
Returns:
The Q matrix.

getR

DenseMatrix64F getR(DenseMatrix64F R,
                    boolean compact)

Returns the R matrix from the decomposition. Should only be called after decompose(org.ejml.data.DenseMatrix64F) has been.

If setZeros is true then an n × m matrix is required and all the elements are set. If setZeros is false then the matrix must be at least m × m and only the upper triangular elements are set.

If parameter R is not null, then that matrix is used to store the R matrix. Otherwise a new matrix is created.

Parameters:
R - If not null then the R matrix is writen to it. Modified.
compact - If true only the upper triangular elements are set
Returns:
The R matrix.

decompose

boolean decompose(DenseMatrix64F A)
Computes the QR decomposition of matrix A. If the decomposition was able to finish without detecting any major issues this function returns true.

Specified by:
decompose in interface DecompositionInterface
Parameters:
A - The matrix being decomposed. Not modified.
Returns:
true if A could be decomposed without error and false if not.
